channel.title: [HELP] im trying to bring MarijanePkZ back guys, just a single problem!
channel.description: hey everyone, some of you know me as ineedmoney ;D , i was owner of marijanepkz if u ever played it, i only had 60 players lol. but uhm im trying to bring it back and im still a little new to coding, i can code decent, but i have a PI source and client, i changed the ip on the client sided client.java and portfowarded tryed several different ways but yet my brother still cant log in to help me with server and on testing, it says " error connecting to server ". can someone please do teamviewer with me? ive done my studies and nothing seams to work so if a professional could do team viewer with me id be grateful! maybe i can reward if needed! please help!

item.title: [HELP] im trying to bring MarijanePkZ back guys, just a single problem!
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

Is it possible that your server only allows 1 connection per ip?
That would explain it.

Read full topic
item.source: [HELP] im trying to bring MarijanePkZ back guys, just a single problem!

item.title: [HELP] im trying to bring MarijanePkZ back guys, just a single problem!
item.dc:creator: @ZioBotic ZioBotic
item.description:
@ZioBotic wrote:

[quote=“djdoyle1, post:13, topic:415320”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=517280.msg3757137#msg3757137 date=1316559314]
If your brother is on the same LAN, then ne connects through 0.0.0.0 not your no-ip…
[/quote]

OH GOD,

No, just no, get your local IP,

Open CMD type IPCONFIG

There should be a number with lots of dots that starts with 192.168 give him that number to connect with as the IP.[/quote]
Dude l2 Correct -.-

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] im trying to bring MarijanePkZ back guys, just a single problem!

@djdoyle1 wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

If your brother is on the same LAN, then ne connects through 0.0.0.0 not your no-ip…

OH GOD,

No, just no, get your local IP,

Open CMD type IPCONFIG

There should be a number with lots of dots that starts with 192.168 give him that number to connect with as the IP.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] im trying to bring MarijanePkZ back guys, just a single problem!
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“MarijanepkzOwner, post:5, topic:415320”]oh i see, so he would log in, how? cause my client.java that he aquired in the clients files has my no-ip adress, if i upload it on megaupload will you give it a shot? i wanna know if u can log in. thanks for the reply no one else does :[/quote]Just go to canyouseeme.org and search the port you are using white running your server and see it it says success. If so, it will allow players to connect to you assuming you have your no-ip running.

Read full topic
